actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Benjamin S. Rosenthal in Washington, District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House to administer the oath of office to the Representative-elect Benjamin S. Rosenthal at Washington, D.C.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Benjamin S. Rosenthal in Washington, District of Columbia.
